title: Hero MotoCorp to set up assembly plant in Nepal with partner CG Motors
description: Hero MotoCorp announced its plans to establish an assembly facility in Nepal through a collaboration with CG Motors, the newly appointed distributor, CG Motors, in the region. The facility, situated in the Nawalpur district, is projected to have an annual capacity of 75,000 units, according to a statement from the country's leading two-wheeler manufacturer.
